text: Killing Zoe is a 1994 French-American crime drama thriller movie. The subject is incidents in Paris, including robbing banks. The robbery at one Paris bank goes wrong. The police get involved and kill all except one of the robbers. This movie was released in August 1994 in the United States. The movie received mixed reviews from the critics. title: Killing Zoe
